pages.title: Ancient Charger
pages.text: The $(thing)Ancient Charger$() serves two purposes. First, it works as an energy buffer. Place it next to a $(l:alientech:machines/pyramid_core)Pyramid Core$() and it will absorb the generated power. Second, it charges items.$(br2)Drop any energy-capable item into its slot (like the $(l:alientech:artifacts/horus_eye)Activated Eye of Horus$()) and it will fill it up.

pages.title: Usage Tips
pages.text: The Charger accepts energy from any adjacent block on any side. It also outputs energy to any adjacent block.$(br2)A charging bar below the item slot shows the current charge level of the inserted item.$(br2)$(italic)Tip: Chain multiple Chargers together for faster item charging, or use them as energy relays between your Core and your machines.$()
